Deck(ArrayList<Card>) - Constructor for class Deck
A constructor that initializes a linkedlist and arraylist based off a linkedlist of Cards ArrayList is the "idle" deck meant to store the Cards between resets LinkedList is the active deck which has cards taken in and out of it

Object representing a TrumpCard, a card which can be played with special abilities.

No args constructor for a new TrumpCard, sets value to 0, type to an empty string, and isPlayed to false
TrumpCard(int, String) - Constructor for class TrumpCard
Constructs a Trump Card with a given value and type, setting isPlayed to false The type of the trump card can be "draw", "gofor", "shield", or "up".
